title: Is it normal to bend your fingers all the way back? - Quora

response.answer_text: That shows how flexible your fingers are, yeah its absolutely normal but along with that you need to make sure that your giving some workout to those fingers in such case were your fingers are one to help you out then you don’t want any unexpected things to happens. so its advice to make some your finger strong with strength and stability along with flexibility. hope you got help from this good luck
